headline: AMAT vs. ONTO: Which Inspection and Metrology Stock Has an Edge?

headline: AMAT Q1 Earnings Call: Revenue Misses, Margins and AI-Driven Demand Shape Outlook
summary: Semiconductor machinery manufacturer Applied Materials (NASDAQ:AMAT) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales rose 6.8% year on year to $7.1 billion. Its non-GAAP EPS of $2.39 per share was 3.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
